name: Wave Shooter VR
description:
Wave Shooter VR is a humorous take on the genre, where you actually wave at enemies to defeat them.

This game was developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2017, with the theme of Waves. It was developed at UC Santa Cruz by Andrew Cousins, Elliot Minner, John McIntyre, Shoshana Bortner, and Georgio Klironomos. Thanks to the Unity App Store Asset Developers for the town, explosion graphics, and music.
